Son of Saul
2:30pm @ Rochester Galaxy 14
Director: László Nemes
Hungary | Narrative

Saul Ausländer is a Jewish prisoner forced to assist the Nazis in the machinery of large-scale extermination. When he discovers the body of a boy he takes for his son, he decides to carry out an impossible task.
